ONLINE VIEWING

South Bank Tower, 55 Upper Ground, Bankside, SE1
£1,875,000
Added on 12/08/2020
PROPERTY TYPE
Apartment
BEDROOMS
x2
BATHROOMS
x2
1

Property description

Tenure: Leasehold

22nd Floor | Floor to Ceiling Windows | Stunning Views | 1177 Sq Ft | Winter Garden | 24Hr Concierge Service | Swimming Pool | Sauna | Steam Room | Business Lounge | Private Cinema | Largest Communal Roof Garden in London | Gym | Restaurants | 995 Year Lease | Vacant and Ready to View

This 22nd floor two bedroom apartment offers 1183 Sq Ft of luxurious living space and amazing views of the River Thames including some of London’s most iconic landmarks - The Shard and St Paul’s Cathedral.

The apartment has wooden flooring throughout featuring an open-plan livig space, a high specification fully fitted kitchen, winter garden accessible from the reception and principal bedroom and two luxury bathrooms with en-suite to the principal bedroom. The apartment further benefits from floor to ceiling windows spanning the entire width of the apartment making it incredibly naturally light.

South Bank Tower benefits from five star amenities ranging from a 24Hr concierge service, a 20m indoor swimming pool, sauna, steam room, business lounge, private cinema, a huge communal roof garden with an entertainment facility available to hire, a gym/spa facilities to restaurants and exclusive retail outlets.

Furthermore, there are also world class theatres, art centers and galleries within walking distance of the development such as the National Theatre, the Old Vic and Young Vic, Shakespeare's Globe Theatre and the Royal Festival Hall. The luxurious shops of Bond Street are just three stops away via Southwark Underground station.

Southwark Underground Station (zone 1) is under half a mile away, which is served by the Jubilee line, offering regular access to Canary Wharf. Blackfriars Underground Station (zone 1) is also nearby, which is served by the Circle and District lines providing direct services throughout central London.

Trains: There are 3 stations within walking distance, London Waterloo East Railway Station is 0.3 miles away (5 min walk), London Blackfriars Railway Station is approximately 0.3 miles away (7 min walk) and London Waterloo Railway Station is 0.4 miles away (8 min walk). Motorway Junctions: M1 J1 is around 6.9 miles away. Flights: London City Airport is 7 miles away.

For more information, please contact Adam Anker at MyLondonHome.

South Bank Tower, 55 Upper Ground, Bankside, SE1

NEAREST STATIONS Distances are straight line measurements from the centre of the postcode

  • Southwark Station 0.3 miles
  • Waterloo East Station 0.3 miles
  • Blackfriars Station 0.3 miles
